message: I propose a fair 60/40 split.  Let's start off strong and hopefully we can both get a good chunk of the money!
Your offer was a good starting point, Alice.  How about a 55/45 split in my favor this time? It's still a good deal before inflation eats away at the value.
Let's be reasonable, Bob.  We both know this money is losing value with every round.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to go.
